page.title: 18LILLESHALL AREA - EDUCATION
page.content:
In our block there are no schools of any kind. The children living in the area have to travel to the nearby towns of Newport, Telford or Shifnal for Secondary education while Primary and pre-school play groups are provided elsewhere in the villages of Lilleshall and Sheriffhales.
The contributors to the text pages are members of the 4th. year of Wrockwardine Wood C.E. Junior School. Caroline Norton Kathryn Ashley Cara Monk Steven Briggs Natalie Kilvert Mr.R.G. Banks Damien Hayler (Deputy Headmaster) Tracey Carter Victoria Lawlor Ginnaya Dyas Sukhvir Uppal Martin White
